tiles.caption: Two Worlds, Two Sides
tiles.text: In Alchimalia there were two very close worlds, but at war. Lunaria — the rabbits’ planet, with carrot fields and burrows. Kelo-Ketis — the cats’ planet, ruled by an emperor. Borders were cold, and bridges were broken.

tiles.caption: Emperor Pufus Alchimus
tiles.text: On Ketis ruled Emperor Pufus Alchimus, a warrior known for conquests. The war with the rabbits had lasted long, and weapons spoke louder than stories.

tiles.caption: The Curious Son
tiles.text: A son was born to the emperor: Puf-Puf Alchimus. His father wanted a fighter. But Puf-Puf loved mathematics, games with the elements, and dreamed of alchemy. He was more explorer than soldier.

tiles.caption: Friends Across the Border
tiles.text: Though there was war, friendship found a way. A black rabbit and a white cat met in secret and shared their worlds. They didn’t look like enemies. They looked like curious children.

tiles.caption: The Stone from Lunaria
tiles.text: On Ketis, Puf-Puf caught them looking at a green stone brought from Lunaria, gleaming like an emerald. ‘Keep the secret of our friendship and we’ll give you the stone,’ whispered the rabbit. Puf-Puf promised.

tiles.caption: The Green-Golden Elixir
tiles.text: With the stone, Puf-Puf made an elixir. When it touched metal, the metal became gold. Great joy! He shared the elixir with his friends — small sips, lots of laughter.

tiles.caption: A Nap Under the Tree
tiles.text: Tired, they fell asleep under a very tall tree. The elixir slowly seeped to the roots. The green stone warmed the earth with a gentle light.

tiles.caption: Cat-Rabbit
tiles.text: When they woke, a strange, beautiful being stood beside them: with a cat’s grace and a rabbit’s gentleness. It looked at them without fear. ‘Hello, I’m the Cat-Rabbit!’

tiles.caption: Question
tiles.question: The stone, the elixir, and the friendship have summoned the Cat-Rabbit to bring peace. What do you do first?

answers.text: We will pour the elixir at each tree.
We plant a tree of peace in both worlds.
We keep the peace at any cost.

tiles.caption: Message of Peace
tiles.text: ‘I carry the peace between worlds,’ said the Cat-Rabbit. ‘From friendship, stone, and elixir a bridge was born,’ said Puf-Puf. ‘Wars fade when you learn to mix things well.’ Puf-Puf understood that alchemy is not only about metals, but also about hearts.

tiles.caption: Puf-Puf’s Decision
tiles.text: That day, Puf-Puf chose his path: explorer and alchemist. He would seek ways between worlds, not wars. And the Cat-Rabbit would, someday, become the sign that peace can be created, not only found.
